A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I fail to understand how this movie is a "certified fresh" at 93% from critics.

This movie has a very confused sense of direction. Probably would be the lowest rated of all previous ones in the franchise. With all the unnecessary narration\, nothing is left to imagination. Useless story arcs. Not to mentions.too much and too loud use of usual tropes.
 
That said Adam Driver does deserve appreciation for standing out even in the limited footage he was afforded

:D managing to find a non lethal blaster gun amidst all the chaos - really convenient and probably unnecessary
